item.title: Communications Systems (HF) – HIGH FREQUENCY (HF) COMMUNICATION SYSTEM – Both Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided communications can be maintained with ATC and company.

numlitem.para: For International Operations, the Captain will contact Flight Control to determine ATC and company VHF/HF communication requirements.
